|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141911720005J R01" is silkscreened on the main board.
"P/N: 141882220001J R01" is silkscreened on the wireless module. *[http://www.marketwatch.com/story/belkin-debuts-80211ac-wi-fir-dual-band-ac-gigabit-routers-2012-06-21 Belkin Debuts 802.11ac Wi-Fi(R) Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Routers] :300Mbps on 2.4GHz + 867Mbps on 5GHz ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial pinout for the device seems to be the following. 
J3
[3.3][TxD][RxD][GND]
  1    2    3
===Info dump=== {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
